name: Wormageddon
description:
Hold off the mythical World Eating Serpent by dodging and blocking attacks. As long as it's busy attacking you, it's not eating the world.

OST below by https://linktr.ee/60across

Change Log:
- Fixed a bug where items in the shop would display the wrong text
- Fixed a bug where you could get duplicates of a purchased item
- Fixed a bug that caused objects to fall inconsistently
- Fixed a bug where the block would simultaneously fail and succeed
- Added WebGL version playable in browser
